responsibilities: Developed and maintained the front-end of the web application.

Collaborated with the design team to improve the user experience.
Led a team of 5 developers in the development of a major project.
Worked closely with backend developers to integrate APIs.
Enhanced application performance by implementing lazy loading and code splitting.
Conducted code reviews and mentored junior developers.
Designed and implemented scalable backend services.
Collaborated with front-end developers to define API contracts.
Ensured the security and compliance of the application.
Assisted in the development of backend services using Java and Spring Boot.
Participated in code reviews and agile ceremonies.
Wrote unit tests to ensure code quality and reliability.
Collaborated with the QA team to debug and resolve issues.
